divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS TRAVILING THREW NEW MEXICO I WAS ABOUT 20 YEARS OLD I SPOTED A SHINNEY OBJECT IN THE DISTANCE I KEPT DRIVING THEN ABOUT TEN MINUTES LATER I SAW THE ORB IT WOULD SKIP BUSH TO BUSH HUVERING OBOVE THE GROUND MAKING NO SOUND SOME TIMES IT WOULD BE OUT IN THE OPEN THEN I WOULD SEE IT REALLY CLEAR I WATCHED IT FOR ABOUT 15 MINUTES THEN IT HIT MY CAR BETWEEN PASSANGER DOOR AND DRIVER DOOR LEFT BIG INDENTION ON MY CAR I STOPED IN SHOCK I SAW THE ORD ONE MORE TIME AFTER IT HIT MY CAR IT WAS ABOUT TREE FEET AWAY FROM ME THEN HUVERED AROUND MY CAR WENT ACROSS THE ROAD ON THE OTHER SIDE OF THE DESERT AND HUVERED TO THE OTHER SIDE THER IS A LOTE MORE TO TELL CONTACT ME IF YOU GUYES WANT TO HERE MORE IT HAS BEEN BUGGING ME FOR YEARS THANK YOU FOR LISTING ERIC EVERSOLE
Summary: Round metalic orb size of basketball hit side of car.
